typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Proc Type} as string,
		{Proc Code} as string,
		{Procedure Description} as string,
		{Unit Value} as double '$#########.###',
		{Basic Rate} as double '$#########.###',
		{Child Rate} as double '$#########.###',
		{ER Rate} as double '$#########.###',
		{Conv Ind} as short '000',
		{ER Ind} as integer '000',
		{Cutback Ind} as integer '000',
		{Prof %} as double '000,000,000.000',
		{Rental Rate} as double '000,000,000.000',
		{Non-Physn Med Prac Ind} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ratesinput
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Modifier as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> modifieruaubinput
interesteddcolumns split(rlike({Proc Type}, '[1IKLMN]'),
	disjoint: true) ~> branchusingproctype@(filterbyproctype)
branchusingproctype@filterbyproctype split({Cutback Ind}==1,
	{Cutback Ind}==0,
	disjoint: true) ~> branchusingcutbackind@(iscutbackind, isnotcutbackind)
ratesinput select(mapColumn(
		{Proc Type},
		{Proc Code},
		{Basic Rate},
		{Child Rate},
		{ER Rate},
		{Cutback Ind},
		{Prof %}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> interesteddcolumns
branchusingcutbackind@iscutbackind derive({Basic Rate} = round(({Basic Rate}*1.2344),2),
		{Child Rate} = round(({Child Rate}*1.2344),2),
		{ER Rate} = round(({ER Rate}*1.2344),2)) ~> increaseratesby23
branchusingcutbackind@isnotcutbackind derive({Basic Rate} = round(({Basic Rate}*1.4344),2),
		{Child Rate} = round(({Child Rate}*1.4344),2),
		{ER Rate} = round(({ER Rate}*1.4344),2)) ~> increaseratesby43
increaseratesby43, increaseratesby23 union(byName: true)~> mergeratesdata
mergeratesdata aggregate(groupBy({Proc Code}),
	{Proc Code Count} = count({Proc Code})) ~> aggregatebyproccode
aggregatebyproccode, mergeratesdata join(aggregatebyproccode@{Proc Code} == mergeratesdata@{Proc Code},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> joinratesdata
discardredundantcolumns split({Proc Code Count} == 1 || ( {Proc Code Count} == 2 && {Proc Type} != '1' ),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(removeduplicates)
joinratesdata select(mapColumn(
		{Proc Code Count},
		{Proc Type},
		{Proc Code} = mergeratesdata@{Proc Code},
		{Basic Rate},
		{Child Rate},
		{ER Rate},
		{Cutback Ind},
		{Prof %}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> discardredundantcolumns
ConditionalSplit1@removeduplicates select(mapColumn(
		{Proc Type},
		{Proc Code},
		{Basic Rate},
		{Child Rate},
		{ER Rate},
		{Cutback Ind},
		{Prof %}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> removecount
removecount filter(({Cutback Ind} == 0 || {Cutback Ind}== 1) && !isNull({ER Rate})) ~> emergencyroomservices
emergencyroomservices derive({Service Description} = 'Emergency Room Services',
		Amount = "$"+toString({ER Rate}),
		Modifier = '') ~> updateerservicedescription
removecount filter((({Cutback Ind} == 0 || {Cutback Ind}== 1) && isNull({ER Rate}) ) && {Proc Code}!='Z7610') ~> feescheduleservices
feescheduleservices derive({Service Description} = 'Fee Schedule Service',
		Amount = "$"+toString({Basic Rate}),
		Modifier = '') ~> updatefsservicedescription
removecount filter({Proc Code}=='Z7610') ~> drugservices
drugservices derive({Service Description} = 'Drugs Service',
		Amount = "",
		Modifier = '') ~> updatedrugservicedescription
updateerservicedescription, updatefsservicedescription, updatedrugservicedescription union(byName: true)~> mergecomputedrates
modifieruaubinput derive({Service Description} = 'Fee Schedule Service',
		Amount = "$" + toString(round(toFloat(replace(Amount, "$", "")) * 1.4344, 2))) ~> updatemodifiervalues
mergemodifiedtcamount select(mapColumn(
		{Proc Code},
		{Service Description},
		Amount,
		Modifier
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChooseCols
Select1, updatemodifiervalues union(byName: true)~> mergeratesandmodifiers
mergeratesandmodifiers derive({Code Type} = iif(rlike({Proc Code}, `[A-Za-z]`), 'HCPC', 'CPT4'),
		{Amount 2} = '',
		{Max Unit} = '',
		{Modifier 2} = '',
		{Amount 1} = Amount) ~> addCodeType
addCodeType select(mapColumn(
		{Service Description},
		{Code Type},
		Code = {Proc Code},
		{Amount 1},
		{Amount 2},
		{Max Unit},
		{Modifier 1} = Modifier,
		{Modifier 2}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> picdataformat
picdataformat sort(asc({Service Description}, true),
	asc(Code, true),
	asc({Modifier 1}, true)) ~> Sort1
mergecomputedrates filter({Prof %}!=0.00 && {Prof %}!=1.00) ~> filterbyprocpercentage
filterbyprocpercentage derive(Amount = "$" + toString(round((1-{Prof %}) *toFloat(replace(Amount, "$", "")), 2)),
		{Service Description} = 'Fee Schedule Service',
		Modifier = 'TC') ~> fsservicedesccomputemodtcamount
mergecomputedrates, fsservicedesccomputemodtcamount union(byName: true)~> mergemodifiedtcamount
ChooseCols derive(allcols = {Proc Code}+{Service Description}+Amount+Modifier) ~> addallcolsvalues
addallcolsvalues aggregate(groupBy(allcols),
	allcolscount = last(allcols)) ~> allcolscount
addallcolsvalues, allcolscount join(addallcolsvalues@allcols == allcolscount@allcols,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> removeduprows
removeduprows select(mapColumn(
		{Proc Code},
		{Service Description},
		Amount,
		Modifier,
		allvalue = allcolscount@allcols,
		allcount = allcolscount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['rates_output.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ratesoutput1
